name: AbstractEnvironment
desc: Base class for creating environment implementations in JetLeaf.

name: ACTIVE_PROFILES_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: Property name used to activate profiles at runtime.

name: AbstractEnvironment.new
desc: Base class for creating environment implementations in JetLeaf.

name: AbstractEnvironment.source
desc: Initializes the environment with a pre-created MutablePropertySources list.

name: DEFAULT_PROFILES_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: Property name used to declare default profiles.

name: IGNORE_GETENV_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: Property name to disable calls to System.getenv().

name: RESERVED_DEFAULT_PROFILE_NAME
desc: Reserved profile name always used if no active/default profile is defined.

name: acceptsProfiles
desc: Returns true if the Profiles predicate matches the environment.

name: addActiveProfile
desc: Adds an additional active profile to the current set.

name: containsProperty
desc: Returns whether the given property key is defined.

name: createPropertyResolver
desc: Creates a new PropertySourcesPropertyResolver using the given propertySources.

name: customizePropertySources
desc: Called during construction to allow subclasses to register default property sources.

name: doGetActiveProfiles
desc: Internal resolution of active profiles using ACTIVE_PROFILES_PROPERTY_NAME.

name: doGetActiveProfilesProperty
desc: Reads the jetleaf.profiles.active property.

name: doGetDefaultProfiles
desc: Resolves the set of default profiles.

name: doGetDefaultProfilesProperty
desc: Reads the jetleaf.profiles.default property.

name: getActiveProfiles
desc: Returns the list of explicitly activated profiles.

name: getConversionService
desc: Returns the ConfigurableConversionService used to perform type conversions.

name: getDefaultProfiles
desc: Returns the list of default profiles used when none are explicitly active.

name: getProperty
desc: Retrieves the value for the given property key, or null if not found.

name: getPropertyAs
desc: Retrieves and converts the value of key to the desired type T.

name: getPropertyAsWithDefault
desc: Retrieves and converts the value of key to T, or returns defaultValue if missing or invalid.

name: getPropertyResolver
desc: Returns the configured ConfigurablePropertyResolver.

name: getPropertySources
desc: Returns the MutablePropertySources backing this environment.

name: getPropertyWithDefault
desc: Retrieves the value for the given key, or returns defaultValue if not present.

name: getRequiredProperty
desc: Returns the property value for key, or throws IllegalStateException if the property is not defined.

name: getRequiredPropertyAs
desc: Retrieves and converts the property key to type T, or throws IllegalStateException if missing or invalid.

name: getReservedDefaultProfiles
desc: Returns the reserved default profiles â€” by default, this is just "default".

name: getSystemEnvironment
desc: Returns the environment variables of the underlying OS.

name: getSystemProperties
desc:
Returns the system properties available to the Dart VM (if any),
such as those passed via --define or custom bootstrap logic.

name: isProfileActive
desc: Determines whether the given profile is currently active.

name: merge
desc: Merges another ConfigurableEnvironment into this one.

name: resolvePlaceholders
desc: Resolves #{...} placeholders in the input text using available properties.

name: resolveRequiredPlaceholders
desc: Resolves #{...} placeholders in the input text using available properties.

name: setActiveProfiles
desc: Replaces the current set of active profiles with the given list.

name: setConversionService
desc: Replaces the underlying ConfigurableConversionService used for type conversions.

name: setDefaultProfiles
desc:
Specify the set of profiles to be made active by default if no other profiles
are explicitly made active through {@link #setActiveProfiles}.

name: setEscapeCharacter
desc: Sets the escape character used to ignore placeholder prefix and separator.

name: setIgnoreUnresolvableNestedPlaceholders
desc: Enables or disables ignoring unresolvable nested placeholders.

name: setPlaceholderPrefix
desc: Sets the prefix that identifies a placeholder in property values.

name: setPlaceholderSuffix
desc: Sets the suffix that identifies the end of a placeholder in property values.

name: setRequiredProperties
desc: Sets the list of property names that are required to be present and non-null.

name: setValueSeparator
desc: Sets the separator for default values within placeholders.

name: suppressGetenvAccess
desc: Checks whether system environment access should be suppressed.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: validateProfile
desc: Validates that a profile name is not empty, null, or starts with '!'.

name: validateRequiredProperties
desc: Validates that all required properties are present and non-null.

name: ApplicationArguments
desc: Defines the contract for accessing and parsing command-line arguments passed to an application.

name: containsOption
desc: Checks whether a given option name is present in the parsed arguments.

name: getNonOptionArgs
desc: Returns all non-option arguments (those without -- prefix).

name: getOptionNames
desc: Returns the names of all parsed option arguments.

name: getOptionValues
desc: Returns a list of values associated with a given option name.

name: getSourceArgs
desc: Returns the raw unprocessed arguments passed to the application.

name: BindException
desc: Base exception for binding failures.

name: cause
desc: The underlying cause of this exception, if any.

name: getCause
desc: The cause of this exception, if any.

name: getMessage
desc: The message associated with this exception.

name: getStackTrace
desc: The stack trace associated with this exception.

name: message
desc: The message describing the error.

name: stackTrace
desc: The associated stack trace.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ConfigurableEnvironment
desc:
A configurable extension of the Environment interface that allows mutation
of environment internals such as active profiles and property sources.

name: getSystemEnvironment

Returns the system properties available to the Dart VM (if any),
such as those passed via --define or custom bootstrap logic.

name: setActiveProfiles

name: setDefaultProfiles
desc:
Defines the default profiles to fall back on when no active profiles
have been explicitly set.

Default implementation of ApplicationArguments that wraps command-line arguments

name: StandardEnvironment
desc:
A concrete implementation of AbstractEnvironment that represents the
default runtime environment for most applications.

desc: The reserved name for the default profile.

name: SYSTEM_ENVIRONMENT_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME
desc: The name used to register the system environment property source.

desc: The name used to register the system properties property source.

desc:
A concrete implementation of AbstractEnvironment that represents the
default runtime environment for most applications.

desc:
A concrete implementation of AbstractEnvironment that represents the
default runtime environment for most applications.

name: AbstractPropertyResolver

An abstract base implementation of ConfigurablePropertyResolver that provides
common functionality for resolving property placeholders, type conversion,
and required property validation.

name: containsProperty
desc: Returns whether the given property key is defined.

name: getConversionService
desc:
An abstract base implementation of ConfigurablePropertyResolver that provides
common functionality for resolving property placeholders, type conversion,
and required property validation.

name: getProperty
desc: Retrieves the value for the given property key, or null if not found.

name: getPropertyAsWithDefault
desc: Retrieves and converts the value of key to T, or returns defaultValue if missing or invalid.

name: getPropertyWithDefault
desc: Retrieves the value for the given key, or returns defaultValue if not present.

name: getRequiredProperty
desc: Returns the property value for key, or throws IllegalStateException if the property is not defined.

name: getRequiredPropertyAs
desc: Retrieves and converts the property key to type T, or throws IllegalStateException if missing or invalid.

name: resolvePlaceholders
desc: Resolves #{...} placeholders in the input text using available properties.

name: resolveRequiredPlaceholders
desc: Resolves #{...} placeholders in the input text using available properties.

name: setConversionService
desc: Replaces the underlying ConfigurableConversionService used for type conversions.

name: setEscapeCharacter
desc: Sets the escape character used to ignore placeholder prefix and separator.

desc: Enables or disables ignoring unresolvable nested placeholders.

desc: Sets the prefix that identifies a placeholder in property values.

name: setPlaceholderSuffix

name: setRequiredProperties

name: setValueSeparator

name: CommandLinePropertySource
desc: A base class for property sources that are backed by command line arguments.

name: COMMAND_LINE_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME
desc: The default name used to register this property source in the environment.

name: CommandLinePropertySource.named
desc: Creates a CommandLinePropertySource with a custom name.

name: CommandLinePropertySource.new
desc: A base class for property sources that are backed by command line arguments.

name: DEFAULT_NON_OPTION_ARGS_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: The default key used to access non-option arguments from getProperty.

name: containsOption
desc: Returns whether the set of parsed options includes the given name.

name: containsProperty
desc: Returns true if this property source contains the given name.

name: getNonOptionArgs
desc: Returns the list of arguments that are not in --key=value format.

name: getOptionValues
desc: Returns the values for a given option name.

name: getProperty
desc: Retrieves the value associated with the given name, or null if not present.

name: getPropertyNames
desc: Returns the full list of property names known to this PropertySource.

name: nonOptionArgsPropertyName
desc: The current key used to access non-option arguments.

name: setNonOptionArgsPropertyName
desc: Allows setting a custom property name for non-option arguments.

name: CompositePropertySource
desc: A composite implementation of EnumerablePropertySource that aggregates multiple PropertySource instances.

name: CompositePropertySource.new
desc: A composite implementation of EnumerablePropertySource that aggregates multiple PropertySource instances.

name: addFirstPropertySource
desc: Adds the given propertySource to the start of the composite chain.

name: addPropertySource
desc: Adds the given propertySource to the end of the composite chain.

name: containsProperty
desc: Checks whether any contained property source has a value for the given name.

name: getProperty
desc: Iterates through all contained property sources and returns the first non-null value for the given name.

name: getPropertyNames
desc: Returns the full list of property names known to this PropertySource.

name: getPropertySources
desc: Returns all PropertySource instances currently contained in this composite.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ConfigurablePropertyResolver
desc:
A specialized PropertyResolver that allows full control over property
placeholder behavior and type conversion logic using a configurable
ConfigurableConversionService.

name: getConversionService
desc: Returns the ConfigurableConversionService used to perform type conversions.

name: setConversionService
desc: Replaces the underlying ConfigurableConversionService used for type conversions.

name: setEscapeCharacter
desc: Sets the escape character used to ignore placeholder prefix and separator.

name: setIgnoreUnresolvableNestedPlaceholders
desc: Enables or disables ignoring unresolvable nested placeholders.

name: setPlaceholderPrefix
desc: Sets the prefix that identifies a placeholder in property values.

name: setPlaceholderSuffix
desc: Sets the suffix that identifies the end of a placeholder in property values.

name: setRequiredProperties

name: setValueSeparator
desc: Sets the separator for default values within placeholders.

name: MapPropertySource
desc: A PropertySource implementation backed by a Map of key-value pairs.

name: MapPropertySource.new
desc: A PropertySource implementation backed by a Map of key-value pairs.

name: containsProperty
desc: Returns true if this property source contains the given name.

name: getProperty
desc: Retrieves the value associated with the given name, or null if not present.

name: MutablePropertySources
desc: A mutable container for managing an ordered list of PropertySource objects.

name: MutablePropertySources.from
desc: Creates a new instance from an existing PropertySources collection.

name: MutablePropertySources.new
desc: A mutable container for managing an ordered list of PropertySource objects.

name: addAfter
desc: Inserts newSource after the named relativeSourceName in the list.

name: addAll
desc: Adds all given sources to the list in their original order.

name: addBefore
desc: Inserts newSource before the named relativeSourceName in the list.

name: addFirst
desc: Adds a PropertySource to the beginning of the list.

name: addLast
desc: Adds a PropertySource to the end of the list.

name: contains
desc: Whether the collection contains an element equal to element.

name: containsName
desc: Returns true if this property sources contains a source with the given name.

name: get
desc: Returns the PropertySource with the given name, or null if not found.

name: iterator
desc: A new Iterator that allows iterating the elements of this Iterable.

name: precedenceOf
desc:
Returns the index position of the given propertySource in the list,
or -1 if it is not present.

name: remove
desc: Removes the PropertySource with the given name, if present.

name: replace
desc: Replaces the PropertySource with the given name with a new one.

name: size
desc: Returns the number of PropertySources in the list.

name: stream
desc: Returns a GenericStream over all PropertySources in this collection.

name: PropertiesPropertySource
desc:
A specialized MapPropertySource that represents traditional Java-style
.properties-like configuration, Dart-style .dart-like configuration,
Environment .env-like configuration, and YAML-style .yaml-like
configuration as a Dart Map.

name: PropertiesPropertySource.new
desc:
A specialized MapPropertySource that represents traditional Java-style
.properties-like configuration, Dart-style .dart-like configuration,
Environment .env-like configuration, and YAML-style .yaml-like
configuration as a Dart Map.

A base abstraction representing a source of key-value properties, such as
